snippet.title: Launch Trailer - Child of Light [UK]
snippet.description:
Enter Ubisoft's playable poem and play Child of Light now! 
Available in Deluxe and Digital Editions on: http://childoflight-game.com/shop  

Once Upon A Time there lived Aurora
A girl born for glory
The daughter of an Austrian Duke.
One night Aurora went to sleep
But the fire burned down low
Taking Aurora's light.
For all, the Child was dead
But in a strange land she awoke instead.
